findings.title: NFT id's collision is possible
findings.description: SafeMint function increments the NFT id counter only after the mint. As a result, safeMint will be executed with an already existing NFT id, which will lead to an exception.

findings.title: Mint is available for everyone
findings.description: Mint function is available without any restrictions, so anyone can mint a token.

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external.
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save Gas.

findings.title: Improper Input Validation.
findings.description: The mint function does not validate input properly, allowing an attacker to craft unintended inputs that may result in altered control flow, arbitrary control of a resource, or arbitrary code execution.
